name: Die Hard
title: Row/Ski Ladder + Sled Push + Farmer Carry

description: Row or Assault Bike x 3–5 min
World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Machine Ladder + Sled Push
alternatives: Sled Push → DB Front Rack Step-Up x 12 @ 2×15/10kg (20" box)
Sled Push → DB Front Rack Walking Lunges x 12 @ 2×15/10kg

C.title: Farmer Carry
description: Break as needed, clock keeps running

scaling.strength: Heavier sled (150/100kg), reduce machine distances by 25%
scaling.conditioning: Lighter sled (100/60kg), add a 6th round: Assault Bike x 20/15 cal → Sled Push 30m

notes: Ascending ladder — pace the early rounds. Good benchmark.
excerpt: Ascending ladder — just keeps escalating, you keep surviving

name: Predator
title: Bike/Row Intervals + Sled Pull + Burpee Broad Jump

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: 5 Rounds — Bike/Row + Sled Pull + Burpee Broad Jump
description: Odd rounds: Assault Bike x 15/12 cal
Every round: Burpee Broad Jump x 20m
alternatives: Sled Pull → Sandbag Clean x 10 @ 40/30kg
Sled Pull → DB RDL + Bent Over Row x 10 @ 2×15/10kg
Burpee Broad Jump → 10 Burpees + 10 Broad Jumps (in place)

scaling.conditioning: As written, push for sub-20 min

notes: Alternating machine each round keeps it interesting. The sled pull + BBJ combo is a HYROX staple.
excerpt: Alternating machine hunts you down round after round

name: Terminator
title: Ski Erg Descender + Wall Balls + Sandbag Lunges

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Ski Descender + Stations
alternatives: Sandbag Lunges → Front Rack DB Walking Lunges @ 2×10/5kg
Wall Balls → DB Thrusters @ 2×8/4kg

scaling.strength: Heavier wall ball (20/14lb), heavier sandbag (30/20kg), cut ski distances by 200m each
scaling.conditioning: As written, add a Zone 2 run x 10 min finisher

notes: Descending ski distances keep the intensity climbing. Wall balls will tax your legs for Tuesday squats — manage effort.
excerpt: Descending ski distances — it won't stop, it can't be bargained with

name: Rambo
title: Row/Bike Pyramid + Sled Push/Pull Combo

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Machine Pyramid + Sled Combo
description: Assault Bike x 20/15 cal → Sled Push 15m + Sled Pull 15m
Assault Bike x 30/22 cal → Sled Push 15m + Sled Pull 15m
alternatives: Sled Push → DB Front Rack Step-Up x 8 @ 2×15/10kg (20" box)
Sled Pull → DB RDL + Bent Over Row x 8 @ 2×15/10kg

scaling.strength: Heavier sled (150/100kg push, 125/75kg pull), cap at 30 min
scaling.conditioning: Lighter sled (100/60kg), push for continuous effort

notes: Pyramid up then back down. The middle round (Row 750m) is the peak — don't go out too hot.
excerpt: Pyramid up and back — drawn-out war of attrition

name: Braveheart
title: Machine Mixer AMRAP 30 + Farmer Carry + Wall Balls

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Machine Mixer
alternatives: Farmer Carry → DB Front Rack Carry @ 2×15/10kg

C.title: Easy Walk or Bike
description: 5 min easy effort — flush it out

scaling.strength: Heavier carries (2×32/24kg), reduce machine distances to 400m

notes: Long AMRAP — find a sustainable pace. All 3 machines in one workout. Score = rounds + reps.
excerpt: 30-minute AMRAP — long, sprawling, you'll need heart

name: Mad Max
title: 6-Round Machine Cycle + Sled Push + Farmer Carry

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: 6-Round Machine Cycle
alternatives: Sled Push → DB Front Rack Step-Up x 12 @ 2×15/10kg
Farmer Carry → DB Front Rack Carry x 100m @ 2×15/10kg

scaling.conditioning: Lighter sled (100/60kg), push for sub-35 min

notes: Full HYROX station density. All 3 machines cycled. This is a long grinder — pace early.

name: Gladiator
title: Row/Ski Intervals + Sandbag Lunges + Burpee Broad Jump

description: Assault Bike or Row x 3–5 min
World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: 4 Rounds
description: Every round: Burpee Broad Jump x 40m
alternatives: Sandbag Lunges → Front Rack DB Walking Lunges @ 2×10/5kg
Burpee Broad Jump → 10 Burpees + 10 Broad Jumps

scaling.strength: Heavier sandbag (30/20kg), 3 rounds, add 200m to machine distances

notes: Lunges + BBJ will light up the quads. Be aware of Tuesday squat day.
excerpt: Lunges + BBJ every round — arena punishment

name: Aliens
title: Ski/Row/Bike Chipper + Sled Push + Wall Balls

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Chipper
alternatives: Sled Push → DB Front Rack Walking Lunges x 20 @ 2×15/10kg
Wall Balls → DB Thrusters @ 2×8/4kg

scaling.strength: Heavier sled (150/100kg), heavier wall ball (20/14lb), cut wall balls to 30 each set
scaling.conditioning: As written — straight through, no breaks on machines if possible

notes: Long chipper. 100 total wall balls is a grind — break early (sets of 15–20) to avoid redlining.
excerpt: Chipper — one long march through hostile territory

name: Lethal Weapon
title: E3MOM Machine + Sled Push/Pull Couplet

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Machine + Sled Couplet
description: Round 3: Assault Bike x 12/10 cal + Sled Push 15m
Goal: finish each round in <2:30 to earn rest
alternatives: Sled Push → DB Front Rack Step-Up x 8 @ 2×15/10kg
Sled Pull → DB RDL + Bent Over Row x 8 @ 2×15/10kg

C.title: 200m Farmer Carry
alternatives: Farmer Carry → DB Front Rack Carry @ 2×15/10kg

scaling.strength: Heavier sled, 6 rounds with E3:30MOM window
scaling.conditioning: Lighter sled, target finishing each round in <2:00

notes: Built-in rest if you move fast. The rotating machine keeps it fresh. Farmer carry finisher is a grip test.
excerpt: E3MOM with built-in rest — buddy-cop pacing, intense then chill

name: Rocky
title: Assault Bike Ladder + Sled Pull + Sandbag Lunges

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Assault Bike Ladder + Stations
description: Bike 10 cal → Sled Pull 10m @ 100/60kg → Sandbag Lunges 20m @ 20/10kg
Bike 15 cal → Sled Pull 15m → Sandbag Lunges 30m
Bike 20 cal → Sled Pull 20m → Sandbag Lunges 40m
Bike 25 cal → Sled Pull 25m → Sandbag Lunges 50m
Bike 30 cal → Sled Pull 30m → Sandbag Lunges 50m
alternatives: Sled Pull → Sandbag Clean x 10/12/14/16/18 reps (ascending)
Sandbag Lunges → Front Rack DB Walking Lunges @ 2×10/5kg

scaling.strength: Heavier sled (125/75kg), heavier sandbag (30/20kg), cap at 4 rounds

notes: Ascending ladder — the bike calories climb fast. Last round is a suffer-fest.
excerpt: Ascending bike ladder — each round hits harder

name: The Matrix
title: Mini HYROX Simulation — 4 Stations

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: Mini HYROX — 4 Stations
alternatives: Run → Row 1000m or Assault Bike x 50/40 cal
Sled Push → DB Front Rack Step-Up x 20 @ 2×15/10kg

scaling.strength: Pro weights (sled 152/102kg, carry 2×32/24kg, wall ball 20/14lb), 3 stations
scaling.conditioning: Open division as written, push pace on runs

notes: Closest thing to a real HYROX race simulation. Track total time — monthly benchmark.
excerpt: Mini HYROX sim — the one where you find out what you're made of

name: Point Break
title: Alternating Machine Intervals + Burpee Broad Jump + Carry

description: World's Greatest Stretch x 5 each side

B.title: 5 Rounds
description: Every round: Burpee Broad Jump x 40m
alternatives: Burpee Broad Jump → 8 Burpees + 8 Broad Jumps
Farmer Carry → DB Front Rack Carry x 100m @ 2×15/10kg

scaling.strength: Heavier carry (2×32/24kg), 4 rounds, add 100m to machine distances

notes: BBJ + carry every round is brutal grip and leg work. Short machine distances keep transitions fast.
excerpt: BBJ + carry every round — relentless adrenaline
